info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Alexander and northern Iredell Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles east of Taylorsville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Statesville, Taylorsville, Stony Point, Harmony, Love Valley, Lake Hickory, Hiddenite, Turnersburg, Olin and Millersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
